tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_conditions (
    location_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    weather_description VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE sports_activities (
  activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(20),
  location_id INT REFERENCES weather_locations(location_id),
  condition_id INT REFERENCES weather_conditions(condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id),
    sport_id INT REFERENCES sports(sport_id),
    report_date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    location_id INT REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE hiking_trails (
  trail_id INT,
  trail_name VARCHAR(50),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(20),
  distance_miles FLOAT,
  elevation_gain INT
);

CREATE TABLE rock_climbing_routes (
  route_id INT,
  route_name VARCHAR(50),
  difficulty_rating VARCHAR(20),
  route_length FLOAT,
  location_id INT
);
